SEARCH
Package com.dreamwork.controller

Class CandidateController

java.lang.Object
com.dreamwork.controller.CandidateController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/candidates") public class CandidateController extends Object
Controller class for managing candidate-related operations, including updating candidate information, applying to job ads, and viewing applied job ads.

      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.

    • updateCandidate

      @PostMapping("/update") public String updateCandidate(@ModelAttribute Candidate candidate, @RequestParam String currentPassword)
      Updates candidate information based on the provided data and current password.
      Parameters:
      candidate - Candidate object containing updated details.
      currentPassword - The current password for authentication.
      Returns:
      Redirect URL to the candidate dashboard with a success flag.

    • getApplyToJobForm

      @GetMapping("/apply/job-ads/{jobAdId}") public String getApplyToJobForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long jobAdId)
      Displays the form for applying to a specific job advertisement.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      jobAdId - The ID of the job ad to apply for.
      Returns:

    • applyToJob

      @PostMapping("/apply/job-ads/{jobAdId}") public String applyToJob(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable Long jobAdId, @RequestParam org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile cvFile)
      Processes the candidate's application to a job ad.
      Parameters:
      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      jobAdId - The ID of the job ad to apply for.
      cvFile - The candidate's CV file uploaded as part of the application.
      Returns:
      Redirect URL to the dashboard with success message or job application form in case of an error.

      @GetMapping("/job-ads") public String getAllJobAdsForCandidate(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      model - Spring's model to add attributes for the view.
      Returns:
      View Html file for listing applied job ads.
